summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ZWAP! Coin PWA after major UI overhaul. All core features working correctly including splash screen, wallet connection, persistent header/footer, tab navigation, and all main tabs (Dashboard, Move, Play, Shop, Swap). Layout is correct with no content cut off or overlapping.

issues: React warning: 'Cannot update a component while rendering a different component' in BrowserRouter/AppContent - minor React state management issue, does not affect functionality
Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent in profile sheet - accessibility improvement needed

passed_tests: Splash screen appears on initial load at root URL '/'
Splash screen shows animated words (MOVE, PLAY, SWAP, SHOP) and ZWAP! logo
Splash screen has 'Enter' button that transitions to WelcomeScreen
Splash screen has 'What is ZWAP!?' button that navigates to About page
WelcomeScreen displays for non-connected users with 3 action buttons (Swap, Earn, Shop)
Wallet connection modal opens with MetaMask, Trust Wallet, Speed Wallet options
Wallet connection modal has 'Help me create a wallet' option
After wallet connection, user is redirected to appropriate tab based on action
AppHeader is visible on /dashboard, /move, /play, /shop, /swap pages
AppHeader shows ZWAP logo, balances (ZWAP and zPts), and profile badge when connected
AppHeader shows 'Connect' button when not connected
Profile badge opens settings sheet with user info (Zwapper#XXXX), tier, upgrade option, and settings menu
NewsTicker is visible at the bottom of all main pages (above tab navigation)
NewsTicker shows rotating content (deals, leaderboard, tips, news)
Bottom tab navigation works correctly with 5 tabs (Home, Move, Play, Shop, Swap)
Dashboard page loads with Today's Progress and 4 feature buttons (MOVE, PLAY, SHOP, SWAP)
MoveTab page loads with step counter, Start/Stop button, and tiered earning display
PlayTab game selection screen shows 4 games (zBrickles, zTrivia unlocked; zTetris, zSlots locked)
PlayTab clicking on zBrickles opens game view with back button and game canvas
PlayTab game view has proper height calculation (no content cut off)
ShopTab page loads with Zupreme Imports header and product categories (Apparel, eBooks, Collectibles)
SwapTab page loads with live prices, token selectors, amount inputs, and swap button
About page loads at /about without header/footer
About page has back button and GET STARTED button
Layout is correct: header at top, content in middle, ticker and nav at bottom
No content overlapping or cut off issues
critical_code_review_comments: Minor React warning about setState during render in AppContent - consider using useEffect for navigation logic
Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent in profile sheet - add for accessibility compliance
test_credentials: Wallet connection uses demo addresses (no real wallet required)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. The app uses WalletConnect-style authentication with demo wallet addresses. Key test-ids are properly implemented: splash-enter, splash-about, action-swap/earn/shop, wallet-metamask/trust/speed, header-logo, profile-badge, tab-home/move/play/shop/swap, dashboard, move-tab, play-tab, shop-tab, swap-tab, game-zbrickles/ztrivia/ztetris/zslots. NewsTicker rotates content every 5 seconds. Leaderboard data in NewsTicker is MOCKED.
